creator: blundberg@ebuilt.com
text:
When a webapp is installed and then removed, subsequent attempts to install an 
app at the same contextPath fail with a NamingException. 


1) http://localhost/manager/install?
path=/a3&war=jar:file:d:/codigoxp/cxviewer.war!/WEB-INF

2001-06-13 10:49:54 StandardHost[localhost]: Installing web application at 
context path /a3 from URL jar:file:d:/codigoxp/cxviewer.war!/WEB-INF
2001-06-13 10:49:54 StandardManager[/a3]: Seeding random number generator class 
java.security.SecureRandom
2001-06-13 10:49:54 StandardManager[/a3]: Seeding of random number generator 
has been completed
2001-06-13 10:49:55 StandardWrapper[/a3:default]: Loading container servlet 
default
2001-06-13 10:49:55 default: init
2001-06-13 10:49:55 action: init
2001-06-13 10:50:00 StandardWrapper[/a3:invoker]: Loading container servlet 
invoker
2001-06-13 10:50:00 invoker: init
2001-06-13 10:50:00 _startup_: init
2001-06-13 10:50:00 _startup_: Processing configuration file /WEB-INF/codigoxp-
config.xml
2001-06-13 10:50:01 StandardWrapper[/a3:jsp]: Using Jasper classloader for 
servlet jsp
2001-06-13 10:50:01 jsp: init
2001-06-13 10:50:02 StandardWrapper[/a3:ssi]: Loading container servlet ssi
2001-06-13 10:50:02 ssi: init

2) http://localhost/manager/remove?path=/a3


2001-06-13 10:50:30 StandardHost[localhost]: Removing web application at 
context path /a3
2001-06-13 10:50:30 ssi: destroy
2001-06-13 10:50:30 _startup_: destroy

3) http://localhost/manager/install?
path=/a3&war=jar:file:d:/codigoxp/cxviewer.war!/WEB-INF

2001-06-13 10:50:43 StandardHost[localhost]: Installing web application at 
context path /a3 from URL jar:file:d:/codigoxp/cxviewer.war!/WEB-INF
2001-06-13 10:50:43 StandardManager[/a3]: Seeding random number generator class 
java.security.SecureRandom
2001-06-13 10:50:43 StandardManager[/a3]: Seeding of random number generator 
has been completed
2001-06-13 10:50:43 StandardContext[/a3]: Error initializing naming context for 
context /a3
2001-06-13 10:50:43 StandardContext[/a3]: Context startup failed due to 
previous errors

4)http://localhost/manager/list

OK - Listed applications for virtual host localhost
/examples:running:0
/webdav:running:0
/manager:running:0
/a3:stopped:0           <==========  app not fully activated
/:running:0

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
The bug should have been fixed since beta 5 (the security token is unset when 
stopping the context). Can you try the latest nightly build, and confirm this ?
Verified that this works with current CVS code.
creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
